comment.author: 22151340@N02
comment._content: Why is this in the archives? Just curious.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/kevkev44] This photograph is part of the Florida Photographic Collection (FPC), which is made up several dozen separate photographic collections. In total, the FPC consists of over one million images. This item in particular was donated by the family of Joseph Janney Steinmetz, a Sarasota-based commercial photographer active from the 1940s to the 1970s. You can read more about Steinmetz and his work by clicking on the link above.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
